prompt: Develop a minimalist file manager with a light gray background and indigo accents. Include 'File Explorer' header with search and sort icons. Add quick access chips (Documents, Downloads, Music, Videos) above a vertical list of files/folders showing icons, names, sizes, and dates. Each list item has subtle indigo underlines and hover effect. Place a centered indigo FAB for adding files, emphasizing simplicity, spacing, and flat design.
